Each member represented will be given an opportunity to report

Saturday Evening:
Entertainment will be available for all who wish to find it.
Suggested possibilities: Visit to Cave-of-the-Mounds; Ringling Bros,
Circus; a boat trip on Lake -Mendota; outing at Thundersiro Camp for
fishing, swimming, boating.
